Text.Page:
, have you heard about the legendary Golden Shark?

It's only the toughest fish I've ever fought. I've lost quite a few lures and rods to that monster since I arrived."Tell me more."

Say, you seem a sporting type. Care to make a wager? If you can catch a Golden Shark before I do, I'll give you all the Angler Tokens I've earned fishing this spot.
If I win, you'll carry the burden of your shame for all eternity...

Just kidding! I'll just laugh at you. A lot.
Graidrem challenged <PCNAME> to a fishing duel, and lost.

I can't believe my eyes. You caught it! You actually caught that thing! Impressive.

A promise is a promise. Here, take the tokens.
You got any bites yet? Remember, a Big-Ass-Fish like the Golden Shark can only be caught when you're fishing manually.
